title: [Brokkrsten's General Store]

[Brokkrsten's Outfitting]
description: Beneath an oak beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the pale ivory plaster walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the oak floor.

Enclosed by pale ivory plaster walls, the shop features a large green ceramic frog in the center of its oak floor.  An oil-filled silver sconce hangs under the oak beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a spacious grey slate counter and a heavy lead glass display case.

Enclosed by honey gold oak walls, the shop features a large green ceramic frog in the center of its oak floor.  An oil-filled silver sconce hangs under the oak beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a spacious grey slate counter and a heavy lead glass display case.
